Name: Vieux Mot
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: There's no lychee in this cocktail but the gin, citrus and elderflower combined are reminiscent of lychee.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2007 by Don Lee at PDT , New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Vieux Mot contains 172 calories
